Key Match Events: Harry Kane scored an early goal for England.
Morten Hjulmand equalized for Denmark with a stunning strike.
Phil Foden hit the post with a 20-yard drive.
Andreas Christensen missed a great chance to secure a winner for Denmark.
Pierre-Emile Hojbjerg's effort curled just wide of Jordan Pickford's far post.
Post-Match Reflections: Gareth Southgate admitted England need improvement after the draw with Denmark.
England remain in control of Group C, topping the table on four points.
Pierre-Emile Hojbjerg was named Player of the Match for his outstanding performance.
